nodes.text: The Gromas Belt was an asteroid belt located in the Gromas system, within the Perkell sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim, in orbit of the star Gromas. In the year 0 ABY, mercenary Kyle Katarn and Rebel operative Jan Ors travelled through the Gromas Belt aboard their starship, the Moldy Crow, while en route to the moon Gromas 16.

The Gromas Belt first appeared without identification in the 1995 first-person shooter Star Wars: Dark Forces, developed and published by LucasArts. It was first identified in "Kyle Katarn's Tale, Mission 3: The Blood Moon," a 2005 Star Wars Miniatures scenario written by Jason Fry and Abel G. Peña and published on Wizards.com. The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, placed the Gromas system, and therefore the Gromas Belt, in grid square Q-7.
